title: gta 4 original files
description:
these are the original files which are often replaced by cracked ones and if the crack doesnt work and there is no backup present you will have to reinstall so this is to help in that situation.


files included:

gtaIV.exe
paul.dll
LaunchGTAIV
Offline Activation Folder



after replacing the originals i would recommend to try this crack  <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4556049/GTA.IV.Crack-SGF" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4556049/GTA.IV.Crack-SGF</a> 

(follow instructions from step 2 if you have already replaced the original files)


this is the only working crack till date and there wont be any wobbling cameras and auto driving cars.


a point to note even after this crack you might have an error "ZLIB20" this is critical problem in the game and also comes in the legitimate version if anyone has a solution to this other than reinstalling from a different source please post it.
